newsitem.title: USA: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times business - Oct 24.
newsitem.headline: PRESS DIGEST - New York Times business - Oct 24.

text.p: The New York Times reported the following business stories in its Thursday edition:
- AT&T Corp has named John Walter, chairman of commercial printing giant R.R. Donnelley & Sons, as its president.
- Wall Street reacted unenthusiastically to the appointment of Walter as president of AT&T.
- St. Jude Medical Inc said its Pacesetter unit would acquire Ventritex Inc in a stock swap worth $505 million.
